response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,100,000. We are confident that this offer presents an excellent balance between value and affordability, allowing you to enjoy all the benefits while making a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,200,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 1100000}
